mapper.select: select trade.*,_invoice.invoice_name,_industry.industry_name,_paycode.paycode_name,_attachment.attachment_url,_user.nick_name as user_nick_name from trade left join(select trade_id,group_concat(value) as invoice_name from trade_invoice group by trade_id) _invoice on _invoice.trade_id=trade.id left join(select trade_id,group_concat(value) as industry_name from trade_industry group by trade_id) _industry on _industry.trade_id=trade.id left join(select trade_id,group_concat(value) as paycode_name from trade_paycode group by trade_id) _paycode on _paycode.trade_id=trade.id left join(select trade_id,group_concat(url) as attachment_url from trade_attachment group by trade_id) _attachment on _attachment.trade_id=trade.id left join user as _user on _user.id=trade.user_id where trade.id=#{_parameter}
